pageContext.geocode_address: 216 Greenfield Ave, San Anselmo, CA 94960, USA
pageContext.course_type_long_description: Play-Well Marin has teamed up with TenkaLabs and their Circuit Cubes to bring a special twist to our core projects. Circuit Cubes unique, semi-transparent design enables kids to literally see the connections they make when they light an LED, power a motor, or activate a switch. Students will learn the fundamentals of engineering as well as gain an understanding of how electricity needs to flow to power up their creations.
